flawed_nl_solution:
She has 2 dogs and it takes 20 minutes to groom just 1 dog so it takes her 2*20 = <<2*20=40>>40 minutes per day to groom 2 dogs
In 30 days, she will have spent 30*40 = <<30*40=12000>>12000 minutes grooming her dogs
There are 60 minutes in an hour so she spends 12000/60 = <<12000/60=200>>200 hours grooming her dogs
#### 200

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1200, not 12000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
